featured.text: 22 other possible transmission routes, researchers at Virginia Tech observed water drops on the leaves of wheat plants that were infected with leaf rust.

Additionally, by having branches that do not touch those of their neighbors, trees may be able to limit the spread of leaf-eating insects, and potentially also the transmission of diseases from tree to tree.

definition.en_def: The act of sending or conveying something from one place to another.
definition.example: The transmission of data over the internet is essential for communication.
